Spears::

She took his arm and stood up. Her was a little wobbly, but 
reasonably ok. She looked at Firearm with fear in her eyes. "Striker 
is...one of them...and no way to get him back?"
She looked at Firearm, but stared off into space. Her spark beat a 
million beats a second. "He's...gone." she said in a shocked voice.

"No..I can't believe it. I won't believe it."  Her love for him 
wouldn't give up on him yet. "No, there has to be a way to save him."

She shook her head trying to clear it. "You said I was taken too, but 
I'm here now. Can we save him the same way you saved me?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm moves over to where Spears fell, offering an arm to help 
her 
> up.
> 
> "Striker was captured along with you," he says sadly, "We didn't 
> succeed in rescuing him. I think he might be converted to the 
> Trainer's side now ... permenately."
>
